description: This file defines a composable function DetailsScreen for an Android app UI using Jetpack Compose, which displays detailed information about a selected item, including its backdrop image, title, metadata, and overview. It references a sample repository to fetch item data and uses Compose UI components to layout the UI.

methods.name: DetailsScreen
methods.description: A composable function that displays detailed information about an item retrieved from SampleRepository by its ID. Shows an image, title, metadata, and overview, with handling for missing items.
